physical_examinations.vital_signs: Creatinine levels: Elevated at 230 mmol/L, previously 119 mmol/L 2 months before; Normalized over 48 hours after NSAID withdrawal.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Incidental diffuse bilateral increased renal uptake of methylene diphosphonate noted on bone scan.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Creatinine levels elevated initially but normalized 48 hours after withdrawal of NSAIDs. Subsequent increase occurred transiently after administration of ketorolac.
